participant_1.background:
I enjoy listening to music during my commute in my silver Lexus.
i enjoy reading and walking on sunny days.
My family is my everything, and I want to find someone who is willing to share that with me.
I like to go to car shows and corvette forums online to learn more about my car and see what other people are doing with theirs.
I can't wait to get home and tend to my greenhouse after the concert tonight.

participant_2.background:
I'm looking for ways to control my blood sugar while still being able to enjoy my active lifestyle.
I tore my ACL while racing go carts and couldn't race for the rest of the season.
I put my children to bed.
i have two tattoos.
i can knit.

content.text: Hi, I am looking for someone who is interested in reading and walking on sunny days.
Hello, I enjoy those things too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read fiction and nonfiction. I am currently reading a book about gardening.
That sounds interesting. I have a greenhouse at my house.
Oh, that is cool. I would love to see it sometime.
Sure, I would be happy to show you it.
Great, I would love to see it.
When are you free to come by?
Okay, I will see you on Saturday.
